scripts.dev: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run electron:dev
scripts.start: concurrently "python backend/window/app.py" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.backend: cd backend && pyinstaller --onefile --add-data "window/templates;templates" --add-data "window/static;static" --hidden-import boto3 --name server window/app.py
scripts.app: cd frontend && npm run build && npx electron-packager . MyFlaskApp --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=../dist --overwrite
